1180670.name: Worldless: Mercenaries
1180670.description:
Worldless: Mercenaries is a fantasy-themed strategy and management game.
Recruit, hire, equip and manage your mercenaries. Send them to explore the world, hunt treasures and trade among cities. They might find a dragon - or be found.

Develop Your Own Team

Recruit and hire characters with different classes, maximize team performance and assign task to them.

Alchemy and Forge

All equipment and potions are unique in Worldless: Mercenaries.
Combine, concentrate or dilute any potions or ingredients you want.
Forge a war-hammer with 60% silver, 10% copper and 30% gold. Why not?

Environment Factors

Wildlife populations vary significantly based on both natural and human factors like weather, seasons, overhunting...etc. Keep an eye on those factors and schedule properly for your team.
